author: Staff Reporter
text:
A eight-day special reconnection and distribution of free mobile SIM cards mela would begin at Kanyakumari Telephone Exchange on Thursday, said a release issued by K. Sajju George, General Manager, Nagercoil Telecom Circle, here on Wednesday.

The release said that the special camps would be arranged to encourage long-time customers of BSNL to avail themselves of reconnection facilities with a host of offers from February 25 to March 10 in different towns.

The date and venue of the camps: Kanyakumari Telephone Exchange Feb. 25, Boothapandi BSNL Exchange Feb. 26, Aralvoimozhi BSNL Exchange Feb. 26, Ethamozhi BSNL exchange Feb. 27, Customer Service Centre at Court Road in Nagercoil on March 4 and 5, Kottar and Vadaseri BSNL Customer Service Centres on March 8 and in Customer Care centres in K.P. Road and Ramanpudur on March 10.

Customers could also avail free portability from other telecom operators and free 3G SIM cards. The camps would be held from 10 a.m. to 5 p.m. the release added.
title: BSNL special reconnection mela
